thread.title: Oscars 2017: Watch Sara Bareilles Sing Joni Mitchell’s “Both Sides Now” For “In Memoriam”
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Watch Sara Bareilles Sing Joni Mitchell’s “Both Sides Now” For “In Memoriam”

author: Noah Yoo
title: Oscars 2017: Watch Sara Bareilles Sing Joni Mitchell’s “Both Sides Now” For “In Memoriam”
text:
Oscars 2017: Watch Sara Bareilles Sing Joni Mitchell’s “Both Sides Now” For “In Memoriam” She accompanied the montage of those who passed in 2016 Photo by Kevin Winter/Getty Images 
Sara Bareilles gave a performance of Joni Mitchell ’s “Both Sides Now” during the “In Memoriam” segment of the 89th Academy Awards tonight. Jennifer Aniston introduced the performance, which was sung over a montage of the actors, directors, and film industry people that passed away in 2016 (which included Prince). Check out video from the performance below. Debbie Reynolds, Carrie Fisher close the In Memoriam tribute at the #Oscars . pic.twitter.com/vVDpageplg — Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 27, 2017 Tags In This Story
